title: Multimedia Self-Directed Learning Course for Strengthening Early Childhood TVET Reading Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic TVET concepts and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Targets university science education majors to cultivate competencies in designing TVET reading education for young children.

learning_goals: Learners can design and produce at least three TVET reading education materials suitable for early childhood developmental stages.
Learners can develop two or more self-directed learning modules using multimedia tools and evaluate their applied effectiveness.
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in transforming TVET-related basic vocabulary and concepts into child-friendly formats.

resources: TVET Early Childhood Education Material Samples

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
